help-file.title: "CREEPING DOOM"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: Yes Duration: 3 waves Type of spell: Summoning
This deadly spell summons millions of arachnids to overrun the Druid's enemies in wave upon wave of insects, all biting their victims at once. This onslaught of insect bites results in significant damage to the victims.
